entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Laramie County through 230 PM MDT... At 157 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles east of Whitaker to 6 miles east of South Greeley to near Carr. Movement was east at 40 mph.
